english.segment1: (Verse 1). Send me a sign. A hint, O whisper. Fill me with life. 'Cause I am listening
english.segment2: Come break the quiet. Breathe your awakening. Bring me the light. 'Cause I am fading
english.segment3: Surround me with the rush of angels' wings
english.segment4: (Chorus 1). Shine Your light so I can see You. Pull me up, I need to be near You. Hold me, I need to feel loved. Can You overcome this heart that's overcome?
english.segment5: (Verse 2). You sent a sign. The hint, O whisper. Human, divine. Everyone is listening
english.segment6: Death laid low. Quiet in the night is stirring
english.segment7: All around the rush of angels
english.segment8: (Bridge). O the wonder of the greatest love has come
english.segment9: (Chorus 2). Shine Your light so all can see it. Lifted up, 'cause the whole world needs it. Love has come, what joy to hear it. He has overcome, He has overcome
